```{r, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(corrr)
library(datos)
```

```{r}
vehiculos
```

```{r}
skim(vehiculos)
```

```{r}
vehiculos %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  select(-id) %>%
  correlate()
```

```{r}
vehiculos %>%
  select_if(is.numeric) %>%
  select(-id) %>%
  correlate() %>%
  rplot()
```
